channel.title: How do i make Guthans work on players

item.title: How do i make Guthans work on players
item.dc:creator: @luis9123 luis9123
item.description:
@luis9123 wrote:

Well heres what i need

if u can help

ok well i have guthans where it heals but only on npcs…i need it to work for pking an all

i have this…

[code]if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 &&

playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)
{
PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6;
stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX);
NewHP += hitDiff;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
}
}[/code]

as well as…

[code]public boolean FullGuthanEquipped() {
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 &&

playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)
{
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]

and also

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public void guthan() { if(misc.random(10) == 1) { stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX); sendMessage("You Drain Your Oponents Health"); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } } }

but it only heals on npcs…so what do i add to make it also heals on players for like pking and stuff like that

[glow=green,2,300]thanks for the help ^.^[/glow][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2008, 09:50:40 am[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
